items.title: The Little Monk
items.describe: The Little Kung Fu Monk protecting his Deva shrine with his Brain Knuckles... Brain Knuckles... Brain Knuckles.

items.title: Indra
items.describe: Indra is King of the Deva and resides in his heavenly palace in Svarga.

items.title: Indrani
items.describe: Indrani is Queen of the Deva and resides in in Svarga with Indra.

items.title: Garuda
items.describe: Garuda the great eagle of the sky people is always watching 5 miles up in the sky.

items.title: Jayanta
items.describe: Jayanta is the son of Indra and Indrani and well is just a totally awesome Deva.

items.title: Francis Friendly
items.describe: The best Sock Monkey friend ever is Francis Friendly.

items.title: Imagine
items.describe: Imagine is the Deva of Imagination... need I say anything more.

items.title: The Flower of Life
items.describe: The Flower of Life growing in the Heavenly Garden.

items.title: The Flower of Heaven
items.describe: The Flower of Heaven growing in the Heavenly Garden.
